Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] Cinema-RF FMV (30fps)
Mod.Author: AxlRose
Mod.Description: - Cinema-RF (Cinema Refine) - AI Upscale and enhancement of all the FMVs + 30fps - 2X upscale from the original PC2000 release (and 4X from the PSX version), using both sources and nothing from the horrible Steam release videos - Using the higher quality soundtracks from the PSX version - These FMVs are as close as possible to vanilla - Interpolated at 30fps with lots of manual tweaks to get the best experience of the original game design.
